title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: This should result in a maximum of one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
1. Open a document in StyledText with word wrap mode enabled.
2. Append N lines to the StyledText.
3. Observe the number of redraws that occur during this process.
